title: Integration with UnoCSS
text: Here is guide how to integrate Vuestic UI colors and breakpoints into UnoCSS configuration.

preparation.title: Preparations
preparation.text0: Before we start with integration, please ensure you have both UnoCSS and Vuestic UI installed. If that's not the case - here are installation guide for the [Vuestic UI](/getting-started/installation) and for the [UnoCSS]((https://github.com/unocss/unocss#installation))[[target=_blank]].
preparation.text1: Also you need to install `unocss-preset-theme` preset.

setup.title: Setup
setup.text: Configure configuration file for the UnoCSS as shown below.
